item.description:
This event will focus on strategy games.  Some examples of strategy games people in this group have been known to enjoy are:

  • 7 Wonders
  • Carcassonne
  • Ra
  • Through the Desert
  • Dominion
  • Ticket to Ride
  • Pandemic
  • Settlers of Catan

So if you like any of these games or want to learn more about these type of games, this event will be for you.  We will leave it up to group choice on what we play that night so please bring your favorites or any new games you received as holiday gifts. If necessary, we will divide into smaller groups depending on group size and game preferences. The event will run until 12:00 midnight.

Food:  Please feel free to bring snacks and/or beverages for yourself or to share.  If there is any interest in ordering pizza or some other type of take-out for dinner, please let me know.

About the location:  
This event will be hosted at a private residence. If you need directions, just ask.  The house is located at the end of a cul de sac. Feel free to park in the driveway or along the street. There are no pets at the premises.
item.how_to_find_us: Private Residence - Email me if you need directions

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Strategy Game Night in Beverly
